title: One of the best horror movie ever made!!!
review: WOW!!! Simply the greatest horror movie of the 90s.Finally, after all the 'Scream,I know what you did last summer' S**T, a real REALLY GOOD horror movie.I will never forget it...never!!!!!!!!!!Those of you who didn't like TBWP are stupid or they don't know anything about horror movies.I've seen it 4 times in one week.I LovE it.
